dmca.title: Copyright Violations
dmca.body:
From: Ron Wainscott Photography [mailto:ron@ronwainscottphotography.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, August 10, 2005 1:32 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Violations


According to the "whois" information, imagevenue.com is hosted on your
servers.  
 
I have NEVER given imagevenue permission to host my copyrighted material,
however, I continue to find my work being hosted on their servers on a daily
basis.  I am demanding that any photos from http://www.dawnavril.com be
deleted from imagevenue's servers immediately.
 
The following is a list of images that I have currently found on
imagevenue's site.  These MUST be removed within one hour:
 
http://img37.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc250
<http://img37.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc250&image=d62_05.jpg>
&image=d62_05.jpg
http://img13.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc14
<http://img13.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc14&image=335_1a3_561.jpg>
&image=335_1a3_561.jpg
http://img29.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc30
<http://img29.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc30&image=dcf_246_06.jpg>
&image=dcf_246_06.jpg
http://img32.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc230
<http://img32.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc230&image=5f0_2d1_1209_4.jpg>
&image=5f0_2d1_1209_4.jpg
http://img38.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc30
<http://img38.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc30&image=4e1_34b_03.jpg>
&image=4e1_34b_03.jpg
http://img17.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc121
<http://img17.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc121&image=8a2_42e_55.jpg>
&image=8a2_42e_55.jpg
http://img31.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc290
<http://img31.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc290&image=c68_468_11.jpg>
&image=c68_468_11.jpg
http://img35.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc120
<http://img35.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc120&image=597_47d_129.jpg>
&image=597_47d_129.jpg
http://img17.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc193
<http://img17.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc193&image=034_4cc_02.jpg>
&image=034_4cc_02.jpg
http://img38.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc104
<http://img38.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc104&image=303_69a_098.jpg>
&image=303_69a_098.jpg
http://img32.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc268
<http://img32.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc268&image=b16_739_05.jpg>
&image=b16_739_05.jpg
 
These are ONLY A FEW of the many images that have been illegally downloaded
from my site and hosted on imagevenue.  This MUST STOP IMMEDIATELY.  Failure
to remove these images will result in legal action against anyone involved
in this illegal activity.  I expect a response by e-mail or by phone at
(251) 967-4226.
 
Sincerely,
Ron Wainscott
